txt.en: Whoever made this camp-site may have left something behind.\n\nYou should search the camp-site for information.

'A Dunlending ambushed you? Then I was right to be wary, for they are a hateful people who will stop at nothing to hinder us.\n\n'We're stretched thin enough as it is -- the last thing we needed was for Saruman to turn his gaze towards the Angle!'

'Do not worry about me -- 'tis a minor wound, nothing more. One of my fellow Rangers is seeking a healer as we speak.

'Do you see that cliff to the south-east, next to the waterfall? I found an unfamiliar camp-site there, devoid of any souls. But I left it alone, intent on first completing a task I had been assigned. As you can see, I haven't been able to go back to investigate.

'I suspect some rather unsavoury folks have made their way northward into this region. For what purpose, I do not know.

'Would you take up the task of investigating the camp-site? Let me know of your findings.'
You have found a couple of signs of life at this camp-site.\n\nYou should examine the footprints for more information.
A half-filled sack of rotting provisions lies limp on the ground
A half-filled sack of rotting provisions lies limp on the ground
Lagordal has asked you to investigate a suspicious camp-site atop a cliff.\n\nThe cliff can be found to the south-east, next to the waterfall opposite of Tornhad.
Dirt covers parts of this camp-fire, as if someone hastily tried to bury it
The moment you tried to examine footprints at the camp-site, a Dunlending attacked you.\n\nYou should return to Lagordal with this news.
Foul activity may be occurring under the Rangers' noses.
